name: rootuser
description:
Made for GGJ 2023.

Welcome to ROOTUSER, hack into the mainfraim and steal as much data as you can. Be sure not to get deleted by the ADMINs, they will steal back data from you. If you're in too deep you can 'quit' while youre ahead to leave with whatever data you've got so far. If you get stuck, enter the command "help" to see the available commands.

Thanks to MIT for the list of words
https://www.mit.edu/~ecprice/wordlist.10000
